content.rendered:
SBA Cares Act Paycheck Protection Program

May 5, 2021

PROGRAM UPDATE: We are no longer accepting applications. We have been informed by the SBA that the Paycheck Protection Program has reached its funding limit.

If you have an application in process, you will be contacted regarding the status of your loan request. Check your email for messages from SBA.Lending@westamerica.com.The Paycheck Protection Program is a federal loan program administered by the SBA. For additional information go to www.sba.gov.

The Paycheck Protection Program is administered by the SBA and is limited to an authorized funding amount as designated by the federal government.The Federal Equal Opportunity Act prohibits creditors from discriminating against credit applicants on the basis of age (provided the applicant has the capacity to enter into a binding contract); color, religion, national origin, sex, marital status; because all or part of the applicant’s income derives from any public assistance program; or because the applicant has in good faith exercised any right under the Consumer Credit Protection Act. The federal agency that administers compliance with this law concerning Westamerica Bank is: Federal Reserve Consumer Help Center, PO Box 1200, Minneapolis, MN 55840.

  • Loan Forgiveness Information
